Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: E. Lutringer
Reviews.Content: great laptop, hard to beat for the price.  plays all my games well, tho i cant run everything at full.  which is a fine tradeoff, cant get better than this for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nvidia graphics card not included??
Reviews.Author: stephen morgan
Reviews.Content: When I go to my control panel and look for graphics all I see is Intel and nothing but Intel. There is nothing on my computer related to Nvidia. I have tried to update drivers and nothing has worked so far.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop. Best bang for buck.
Reviews.Author: Filipinorock
Reviews.Content: Super fast and a very light laptop. Highly recommend Asus products after buying my first router from them. This laptop is no different. Great looking screen and the keyboard is designed for easy use and cleaning.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-2670QM 2.2GHz Quad Core
4GB DDR3 10600, 750GB Hard Drive
NVIDIA GeForce GT 610M 2GB Graphics
802.11n  Wi-Fi, Webcam, and HDMI
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS A53SD-TS71 Core i7 4GB/750GB NVIDIA GT 610M Laptop
